str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

word: He might be the Lord of
parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have authority, rule over. From kurios; to rule.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
